com.rift.coad.lib.thread.pool
Class ThreadPoolManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.thread.pool.ThreadPoolManager

public class ThreadPoolManager
extends java.lang.Object

This object is responsible for managing a pool of threads assigned to process a task object.

Nested Class Summary
 class ThreadPoolManager.PoolThread
          This class is responsible for processing the tasks.

                         java.lang.Class taskClass,
                         java.lang.String username)
                  throws PoolException
Creates a new instance of ThreadPoolManager

Parameters:
size - The size of this thread pool.
taskClass - The class that implements the task interface.
username - The name of the user that the threads will run as.
